Name: The Crow
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: If you use quality pomegranate syrup and have a penchant for Scotch, then you could be pleasantly surprised by this cocktail.
History: The Crow cocktails first appears in Judge Jr.'s 1927 Here's How! Revised Edition and is repeated in Harry Craddock 's influential 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of The Crow contains 131 calories
